mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eb21 e JOIN commitment c ON e.commitmentId = c.id WHERE REPLACE(c.commitmentNo, '-', '') = #{commitmentNo}

SELECT e.*, c.commitmentNo, s.sponsorNo, s.name sponsorName, d.name donationPurposeName, cp.name corporateName, og.codeName organizationName, ec.[description] FROM EB21 e JOIN commitment c ON c.id = e.commitmentId JOIN sponsor s ON s.id = c.sponsorId LEFT JOIN donationPurpose d ON d.id = c.donationPurposeId LEFT JOIN corporate cp ON cp.id = d.corporateId LEFT JOIN code og ON og.id = d.organizationId LEFT JOIN cmsErrorCode ec ON ec.code = e.errorCode WHERE e.paymentDate BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} AND (#{state} = 'all' OR #{state} = e.[state])
mapper.insert: INSERT eb21(commitmentId, paymentDate, state, errorCode) VALUES (#{commitmentId}, #{paymentDate}, #{state}, #{errorCode})
